runs.comm: short ball outside off, good pace, Jayawardene swishes at it but misses
fuller and closer to off this time, opens the face to steer the ball to backward point
fullish and down the legside, off the pads to the keeper
back of length, angling into off, defended back towards the bowler
Jayasuriya gets his first run, given a bit of width, guides the ball towards third man
short and fast, Jayawardene goes for the pull, misses, ball sails to the keeper
full and a hint of swing, on offstump, jabbed back over the bowler for four
Dropped by Pollard, short and wide, Jayasuriya plays a powerful cut, flies low to Pollard at backward point, should have been taken
full delivery this time, mistimed towards the leg side
is he out this time? goes for the pull, but the ball hits something on the way as it lobs to first slip, replays show it is the arm guard
big appeal for lbw, length ball sliding into the pads, Jayasuriya misses as he looks to play to the leg side, might have been slipping down leg
tucked to square leg for a single
Jayasuriya's stay is over, a short ball is helped along to short fine leg, hits high on the bat, lamost near the maker's name, the move to push up Jayasuriya has flopped
fuller delivery, Sangakkara inside-edges onto his pads
just outside off, defended towards backward point by Sangakkara
keeps it full, on the legstump this time, blocked by Sangakkara
similar delivery, looks to clip it behind square leg, hit on the pads and he gets a leg-bye
Jayawardene makes room to carve the ball towards point for a couple

dropped, Sangakkara would have been gone for a duck, back of a length and well outside off, Sangakkara looks to drive on the up, gets an outside edge to first slip where Gayle shells the chance diving to his left
Jayawardene is having no trouble here, overpitched this time, Jayawardene charges out and slams it over long-on
Jayawardene carries on in the same form he has shown for the last month, swung away to backward square leg for four
full length on the pads, down the leg side
backs away and looks to stab it through the off side, misses the short of length ball which misses the offstump
short of length and outside off, chopped towards third man
length ball angling into off, pushed towards extra cover
Sangakkara dances down the track and makes room, flatbats the ball just over the bowler's head, an ugly-looking shot from the Sri Lankan captain
nothing ugly about this stroke, short of length ball is cut away gracefully behind point for four
more width for Jayawardene, who swishes and misses
slower ball, full and outside off, Jayawardene moves across the stumps and whacks the ball towards midwicket
shortish ball, Sangakkara makes room and upper cuts it over backward point for four
another atypical Sangakkara shot, moving away from leg, and flatbats it over mid-on, gets enough power behind it to get himself four runs
lot of bounce for him, turns away after pitching on middle and off, Jayawardene misses the cut
short again, pushed towards cover
this time, Jayawardene makes him pay, skips away from leg, and a times his cut shot to perfection, a diving Pollard can't stop it
tucked towards square leg for a single
on offstump, stands tall and punches towards mid-on
full and way down leg, keeper can't collect and batsmen run through
length ball on middle and leg, eased towards mid-on
back of a length, angling across the batsman, who defends to the off side
length ball on offstump, driven down to long-off for one more
nicely fielded by Bravo, a firm punch by Sangakkara towards the bowler, who gets down quickly to stop the ball
there's a man at long-off, but he can only watch the ball sail over after Sangakkara charges out off the crease and slams the ball flat, fielder thought he had a chance
dances down the pitch again, punched back to the bowler
stays in the crease and pushes back to the bowler this time
nicely done by Jayawardene, makes room and dabs the ball past the keeper, very fine to third man
Sangakkara looks to power a wid-ish ball towards point, misses
a touch short from Benn, swung away to midwicket
tucked from middle stump towards square leg by Jayawardene
a full toss outside off, Sangakkara wanted to hammer that one, but hits it into the pitch and back to the bowler
no mistake from Sangakkara this time, a touch short from the bowler, Sanga clubs that over deep midwicket
short of length ball played with soft hands towards deep midwicket, batsmen zip through for the second, Jayawardene would have been out if there had been a direct hit
very wide outside off, Jayawardene reaches across for it and slaps it over backward point for four, 17 runs behind square on the off side now for him
make that 21, this was a trademark Sammy indipper, hardly any room for Mahela, but that doesn't stop him form delicately tipping the ball between the keeper and short third man
driven firmly towards extra cover
again attempts the dink to third man, but the ball bounces more than he expected, so he doesn't make contact
tipped towards point and the batsmen scamper a single
dropped, tough chance for Pollard, a short of length slower ball is punched back by Sangakkara, Pollard sticks out his left hand but can't hold on to the powerful shot at shoulder height
mishit from Jayawardene, towards wide long-on, luckily for him, it lands between three fielders
on legstump, worked to midwicket
length ball outside off, forced towards sweeper cover for a single
a bit of bounce for Pollard, Sangakkara looks to slap the ball towards midwicket but is beaten, awkward take for the keeper
an ungainly stroke from Sangkkara, bends and tries to slog the ball towards square leg, gets a healthy top-edge which flies over the keeper and rolls away for four
length ball outside off, easy for Jayawardene, takes a step out of the crease and swings it over the long-off boundary for six
makes room and chops the ball towards deep backward point
backs away and muscles the ball along the ground to sweeper cover
cheeky from Jayawardene, moves well across the stumps, ducks to get under a shortish ball, and paddles it past the keeper for four to bring up his half-century
deft from Jayawardene, length ball outside off, dabbed to third man
back of length ball, Sangakkara swats it to midwicket, placement isn't too good
another glide to third man from Jayawardene
well outside off, Sangakkara chases it but misses
Sangakkara mistimes this one towards mid-on, a direct hit form Bravo would have caught Jayawardene well short as he was scampering for the second
swept in front of square leg for a single
gets on the front foot and tonks it towards sweeper cover, one bounce to the fielder
full toss outside off, thanks says Sangakkara as he flat bats it powerfully down the ground for four
length ball this time, bunted to long-on for a single
first ball of this spell is sliced over cover, Bravo races back and dives but the ball lands beyond him
lovely shot for a single, Sangakkara gets down the track and plays with a straight bat, one bounce to long-on
wow, Jayawardene moves across the stumps, bends his knee, and swings a length ball from outside off to deep backward square leg, stunning innings from Jayawardene here
length ball is driven elegantly to long-off for a single
back of a length ball, Sangakkara again shimmies down the track, punches in the air towards long-on
one of the rare sing-and-misses from Jayawardene, length ball outside off, Jayawardene was eying the midwicket boundary
shortish ball, played with a flat bat uppishly to long-off for a single
full delivery, heading for middle and leg, turned towards midwicket
Sangakkara misses an outside-off ball as he looks to swipe to midwicket
a low full toss on middle, slugged towards midwicket, not great timing
Jayawardene continues to find run-making easy, a fullish ball outside off, craced towards sweeper cover, a diving Keamr Roach fields on the boundary
again Jayawardene shows his innovation, shuffles across the stumps, gets down on one knee and paddles the ball to deep backward square from well outside off
overpitched on middle and off, driven down to long-on for a single
missed stumping, plenty of bounce and turn after pitching well outside off, Jayawardene was well out of the crease and beaten, Fletcher couldn't collect the ball cleanly
tossed up by Benn, worked towards sweeper cover
Sangakkara gets his half-century by tucking the ball towards deep midwicket

oh my goodness, Jayawardene is leading a charmed life, tries to swing it towards the on-side, gets an edge that swirls high and lands between the keeper and short third man, either of them could have caught it if they called, neither did, and the ball lands safely between the, amateur hour here, Hinds was the other fielder
crunched down to long-on for a single
Jayawardene backs away and cuts the ball to his favourite backward point area
Sangakkara takes a leaf out of Jayawardene's book, moves across the stump and tries to scoop the ball over short fine leg, mistimed but clears the fielder
for a moment you thought that was a catch to fine leg after Jayawardene whipped it off his pads, but it lands well short of the fielder
full and outside off, clears the front leg and swipes it to wide long-on
a bouncer over Jayawardene's shoulder, goes for the pull but misses
length ball is muscled down to long-on for a single
Sangakkara shimmies out of the crease to get near the pitch of the ball and a lovely swing of the bat sends the ball sailing to the sightscreen, spoils what had been a decent over for WI till then
length ball outside off, punched wide of long-off for a couple
a yorker outside off from Benn, Jayawardene manages to squeeze that between short third and backward point for two more
lovely shot from Jayawardene, charges down the track and lofts effortlessly over long-off for six
goes for the reverse-sweep this time, misses and is truck on the pads outside off
a bit of an inside edge as he dances down the track to try and clear long-on, ball fizzes towards midwicket
a powerful straight hit from Sangakkara, over Benn's head and beats the men at the boundary as well
full and onto the pads, Jayawardene makes room and pushes the ball towards long-on, not too well timed so there's time to take two
Jayawardene looks to make room, Roach tries to follow him but his yorker is too far down leg, Fletcher  dives but can't collect, that's five free runs
better yorker this time, closer to legstump, dug out towards the leg side
full and wide outside off, Sangakkara was backing away so he couldn't reach that one
tries to repeat the previous delivery, but is too far outside off
sliced towards deep point this time for a single
another single, this time to deep midwicket by Jayawardene
short of length and outside off, Sangakkara swipes it towards mid-on
full ball is driven along the ground to long-on
slightly shorter, Sangakkara skips away from leg and carves the ball towards sweeper cover
overpitched outside off, lofted towards mid-off for a single, think of the second but decide against it
the partnership finally ends, Sangakkara holes out to Pollard at long-off, too late for Windies?
Can Jayawardene get to his century? an overpitched ball is swung over midwicket for six more, he moves to 93
low full toss outside off, Jayawardene glides to 97 by carving that one in front of point for four more
Kapugedera goes for a big heave and misses, the ball gets to the keeper, Jayawardene screams for the bye and gets it
full and angled into Jayawardene, who can get the ball away only as far as mid-off
not very well timed by Kapugedera, but enough on it to get towards wide long-on for two

Jayawardene remains off strike as Kapugedera gets a streaky four, a miscued hit swirls towards deep extra cover where Bravo doesn't judge the ball too well, his dive doesn't end in a catch and the ball rolls for four
an almighty heave, middle stump is knocked back, end of Kapugedera, no century for Mahela
the final ball is full and on legstump, Dilshan swings it away to deep backward square leg for four
